page.title: 08POLICE STATION
page.content: Police Station Has grown from police house/station to its present state and now employs approx,40 people.Ranks range from police constable to chief superintendent.Aim is to increase number of community constable whose job it will be to walk around village. Vehicles at station - 2 cars, 1-C.I.D. car.No.of cells - 3.Qualif- ications - at least 4-G.C.E.'O' levels and first aid training. No computer at station.Most are at Sheffield but link for national computer is in Doncaster main police station.Crime rate increasing yearly but detection rate good. The local police transport section is situated on Carcroft Industrial Estate.The main purpose of this section is patrol work and attending serious accidents.
